review: Doctor Chawla's diagnosis was very precise, and her medication healed me very quickly. She has an excellent understanding of medical issues. She is very empathetic and explains the issue and at the same time very precise in her communication. I am thankful for having been referred to such an outstanding Doctor.

review: Dr. Chawla  seems to be an experienced doctor, however she also seems to be too mechanical when it comes to dealing with patients. In my case neither did she explain the probable cause of my issues nor did she tell me why she was recommending me the prescribed medicines or even suggest a few basic do's and don't s. I felt the human touch was greatly missing from my interaction with her.
She is very friendly and has a keen sense of observation. Was precise in her assessment of me as her patient
Short and productive visit. Dr Chawla diagnosed my condition, wrote a prescription for medication, and explained what was wrong.
